name: Miskatonic Brain Drain
description:
Have you ever attempted to battle against your own best senses? Have you ever been in a situation that you've needed to visualize as something completely needlessly complex to escape out of? Do you hate approximately 2 minutes of your own time and need to kill it as easily as possible?

Then here's the game for you - spot whelming visual effects, semi-functional gameplay! The music is bad. It's all bad. But it should probably work.
